scripts.og:traq: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i https://raw.githubusercontent.com/traPtitech/traQ/master/docs/v3-api.yaml -o ./src/modules/external/traq/ --api-package api --model-package model --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true
scripts.og:knoq: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i https://raw.githubusercontent.com/traPtitech/knoQ/master/docs/swagger.yaml -o ./src/modules/external/knoq/ --api-package api --model-package model --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true
